name: Geminos
description:
Geminos is an astrology dice game, played with two 12-sided dice that have zodiac signs on their sides. Your score depends on the affinities between the pair of astrological signs that you roll on each turn.

* Throw the dice.
* Interpret the signs.
* Mark your score.

Click the app support link to see a detailed description of the game.

The app provides animated 3D dice, astrological charts for mapping the affinities, scoring tables, and score cards for up to five players per game.
